title: Drink Without a Name Recipe
full_text:
Drink Without a Name Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Total
5 mins
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
2
ounces
vodka
1/4
ounce
cointreau
1/8
ounce
green chartreuse
Directions
Combine ingredients in a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Twist a piece of orange peel over the drink and use as garnish.

Liqueurs & Fortified Wines
